text:
Time once again to remind the @EnvAgency board about their obligations as public appointees (PA) and what the PA Code of Conduct says about things such as leadership, openness and accountability.

@BBCPanorama @10DowningStreet @cabinetofficeuk https://t.co/IP3L8GmPwj https://t.co/cuXZ7chVFg

@SOPH_C_ @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @NewsNBC @UHNM_NHS @KeeleUniversity @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @StinkStopthe By the way my house stinks now... what a great time to be alive... avoid Newcastle under Lyme today folks unless you have breathing apparatus #stopthestink https://t.co/3T1lUgHPGJ
@MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency Thanks @MrNickKnowles üßîüèªüìªüí•

@MrNickKnowles @EnvAgency This putrid smell is ruining our lives, affecting our local hospital and local schools, business and homes. Have u seen how close it is to actual homes. All we want is to breathe fresh air. That's it

RT @MrNickKnowles: The @EnvAgency hadn‚Äôt turned them on - it‚Äôs not just the site that‚Äôs starting to stink üò≥
Has news covered this? Surely i‚Ä¶
RT @StinkStopthe: @MrNickKnowles @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO @The_RHS Last one mate, have a look at this video. https://t.co/V5KOJPTXe5

@SOPH_C_ It‚Äôs bad somewhere everyday @EnvAgencyMids have had 12,000 complaints about the stench from @RedIndustries2 landfill in 3 months @NewsNBC @UHNM_NHS @KeeleUniversity are virtually ‚Äòno go‚Äô zones, environmental crisis @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg  @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

@mca_debbie @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg I was at Roe Lane football pitches on Sunday, watching my son play and the smell was vile. It was very much like the dead animal wagons. How is that right?

entity.name: Rules of Engagement
entity.description: The different phases of male-female relationships are examined as seen through the eyes of young couple Adam and Jennifer. Their friends include longtime-married pair Jeff and Audrey, and a womanising singleton named Russell. As Adam and Jennifer find out, the often-confusing stages of a relationship can seem like a ride on a roller coaster: Folks can describe it to you, but you have to take the trip for yourself to know what it's like.

text:
RT @lucyb221: I will give credit where credit is due to the @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency & that is your call handlers.
I‚Äôve just spent 20mins‚Ä¶
RT @MrNickKnowles: @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @WHO If you type green lobby groups into a search engine you can find a list of them‚Ä¶

Ours have asked @MPGeorgeEustice for a public enquiry into @EnvAgency but as far as I‚Äôm aware he‚Äôs been silent on the matter. Self funding is something we are looking at, problem is if we lose their legal fees & have to pay them they were ¬£2.2 million last time apparently ü•∫ü•∫ https://t.co/4tcVNMjeMh
